summary: Contains unit tests that validate the DiTTransformer2DModel implementation, checking that it can be instantiated with various configurations, produces tensors of expected dimensions, correctly maps class names across config versions, and supports gradient checkpointing.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the 2â€‘dimensional transformer component used in diffusion pipelines, facilitating reliable model deployment and training by catching regressions in configuration handling and performance optimizations.
